issue.title: Got stuck in "loading wallets", then segfault on closing
issue.body:
I was starting Bitcoin-Qt but it got stuck in the "loading wallets" screen. After some waiting I clicked the close button on both the loading screen and the main screen. Nothing happened at first, then it started the closing procedure, and looks like it segfaulted.  Coredump information is below. I'm using the latest master from git on QubesOS/Fedora36.
